participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic, passionate about music, and caring.
participant_1.background: I love going to concerts and dancing hard. I like horseback riding. My favorite food is cheese. I work at a non profit that helps children. I'm allergic to shellfish.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back, optimistic, and enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: I want to own a house on a beach. I love eating at McDonald's. The only music I listen to is pop, because it makes me feel happy. Watching NASCAR races is a great way to spend a Sunday for me. My parents both are school teachers.

content.text: I love going to concerts and dancing hard.
Me too! I love the energy of a live show.
What's your favorite type of music?
I mostly listen to pop, because it makes me feel happy.
I love pop music too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I love Lady Gaga, Taylor Swift, and Katy Perry.
Me too! I love their music.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like horseback riding, and my favorite food is cheese. I also work at a non-profit that helps children.
That's great! I love eating at McDonald's, and I want to own a house on a beach.
That sounds like a great goal! I'm allergic to shellfish, but I love going to concerts and dancing hard.
I love it! I'm glad we have some things in common.
Me too! I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun hanging out together.
I think so too! We should get together sometime.
